extension.name: SimpleMDE Markdown Editor
extension.description: Add SimpleMDE Markdown Editor to markdown enabled fields.

releases.release: - Added compatibility with height settings of Multilingual Textbox Field
- Ensure compatibility with »Are you sure?«-extension by forcing textarea-sync
- Use »+« as default character for lists - Tab = 4 spaces
- Remove Fontawesome external dependency - Update SimpleMDE to v1.11.2
- Editor height now adapts to the row-settings of the textarea - Use Symphony's default font settings (instead of monospace fonts)
- Now works with multiple markdown textareas - No more JS Error when there’s no textarea on the page
